div.p: oṃ namaḥ śrīhevajrāya ||
evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittahṛdayavajrayoṣidbhageṣu vijahāra | (1)

tatra bhagavān āha | sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittahṛdayaṃ bhaṭṭārakaṃ guhyātiguhyataraṃ | aho vajragarbha sādhu sādhu mahākṛpa mahābodhisattva [bodhisattvasya] vajrasattvasya mahāsattvasya samayasattvasya [jñānasattvasya] hṛdayaṃ hevajrasaṃkhyaṃ śṛṇu | (2)

lg.l: vajrasattvo bhavet kasmāt mahāsattvo bhavet kathaṃ ||
samayasattvo bhavet kena kathayatu bhagavān mayi || (3)
abhedyaṃ vajram ity uktam sattvaṃ tribhavasyaikatā ||
anayā prajñayā yuktyā vajrasattva iti smṛtaḥ || (4)
hevajran tu bhavet kena īdṛśaṃ nāmasaṃgrahaṃ ||
hekāreṇa kim ākhyātaṃ vajreṇāpi kim [tathā] ucyate || (6)
hekāreṇa mahākaruṇā vajraṃ prajñā ca bhaṇyate ||
prajñopāyātmakaṃ tantraṃ tan me nigaditaṃ śṛṇu || (7)
bhāvaṃ bhāvyaṃ bhavet prājña abhāvaṃ ca parijñayā ||
tadvac chrīherukaṃ bhāvyam abhāvaṃ ca parijñayā || (11)

p.l: vajragarbha āha | he bhagavan vajradehe katamā nāḍyaḥ |
bhagavān āha | dvātriṃśan nāḍyaḥ | dvātriṃśad bodhicittāvahā mahāsukhasthāne sravante | tāsāṃ madhye tisro nāḍyaḥ pradhānāḥ | lalanā rasanā avadhūtī ceti | (13)

lg.l: abhedyā sūkṣmarūpā ca divyā vāmā tu vāminī ||
kūrmajā bhāvakī sekā doṣā viṣṭā ca mātarī || (16)
pravaṇā kṛṣṇavarṇā ca surūpiṇī sāmānyā hetudāyikā || (17)
viyogā premaṇī siddhā pāvakī sumanās tathā ||

div.p: vajragarbha uvāca | etā dvātriṃśan nāḍyo bhagavan kīdṛśāḥ |
saṃvarabhedaś ca kathyate | āli-kāli-candra-sūrya-prajñopāya-dharma-saṃbhoga-nirmāṇa-mahāsukha-kāya-vāk-cittaṃ | evaṃ mayā || (21)

lg.l: makāreṇa pāṇḍurā ca yākāreṇa tāraṇī smṛtā || (22)

div.p: nirmāṇacakre padmaṃ catuḥṣaṣṭidalaṃ | dharmacakre aṣṭadalaṃ | saṃbhogacakre ṣoḍaśadalaṃ | mahāsukhacakre dvātriṃśaddalaṃ | cakrasaṃkhyākrameṇa vyavasthāpanaṃ | (23)
catvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ | vicitravipākavimardavilakṣaṇāś ceti (24)
catvāry aṅgāni | sevāupasevāsādhanāmahāsādhanāś ceti (25)
caturāryasatyāni | duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgāś ceti | (26)
catvāni tattvāni | ātmatattvaṃ mantratattvaṃ devatātattvaṃ jñānatattvaṃ ceti (25)
catvāra ānandāḥ | ānandaḥ paramānando viramānandaḥ sahajānandaś ceti | (28)

catvāro nikāyāḥ | sthāvarī sar
vāstivādaḥ saṃvidī mahāsaṅghī ceti | (29)
candra-sūrya āli-kāli ṣoḍaśasaṃkrāntiś catuḥṣaṣṭidaṇḍo dvātriṃśannāḍī catvāraḥ prahārā evaṃ sarve catvāraḥ | (30)

lg.l: dahati ca locanādīḥ || dagdhe 'haṃ sravate śaśī || (31)

div.p: sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittahevajrakulapaṭalaḥ prathamaḥ |

mantrapaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
sarvabhautikabalimantraḥ | oṃ akāro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇām ādyanutpannatvāt oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā (1)
tathāgatānāṃ bījaṃ | buṃ aṃ jrīṃ khaṃ hūṃ | (2)
hevajrasya hṛdayaṃ | oṃ deva picu vajra hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā | (3)
sarvamantrapadāḥ | oṃkārādisvāhāntā hūṃphaṭkāravidarbhitāḥ (4)
purakṣobhamantraḥ | oṃ a ka ca ṭa ta pa ya śa svāhā (5)
yoginīnāṃ bījaṃ | a ā i ī u ū ṛ ṝ ḷ ḹ e ai o au aṃ aḥ (6)
dvibhujasya | oṃ trailokyākṣepa hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā (7)
caturbhujasya | oṃ jvalajvalabhyo hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā | (8)
ṣaḍbhujasya | oṃ kiṭi kiṭi vajra hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā (9)
kāyavākcittādhiṣṭhānamantraḥ | oṃ āḥ hūṃ (10)
bhūmiśodhanamantraḥ | oṃ rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā (11)
stambanaṃ | oṃ hūṃ svāhā (12)
vaśyaṃ | oṃ aṃ svāhā | (13)
uccāṭanaṃ | oṃ khaṃ svāhā (14)
vidveṣaṇaṃ | oṃ jrīṃ svāhā | (15)
abhicārukaṃ | oṃ buṃ svāhā | (16)
ākarṣaṇaṃ | oṃ hūṃ svāhā | (17)
māraṇaṃ | oṃ ghuḥ svāhā | (18)
oṃ kurukulle hrīḥ svāhā | (19)

oṃ-āḥ-phuḥ-kāraṃ anantapratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā pañcāmṛtena snāpayet | kṛṣṇapuṣpeṇārcayet | nāgadamarakarasena lepayet | hastimadena śiro lepayet | śarāvadvayena saṃpuṭīkṛtya sthāpayet | kṛṣṇagokṣīreṇa pūrayet | kṛṣṇakumārīkartitasūtreṇa veṣṭayet | vāyavyāṃ diśi puṣkariṇīṃ
kṛtvā tam anantaṃ sthāpayet | tasyās taṭe maṇḍalaṃ vartayet | kṛṣṇarajaḥ śmaśānāṅgāreṇa sitarajo narāsthicūrṇena pītarajo haritalaktena raktarajaḥ śmaśāneṣṭakena haritarajaś cauryapattranarāsthicūrṇabhyāṃ nīlarajo narāsthiśmaśānāṅgāracūrṇabhyāṃ rajobhir ebhir maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvā śmaśānasūtreṇa saṃsūtrya trayahastaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tryāṅguṣṭhādikaṃ | tanmadhye 'nantākrāntaṃ hevajraṃ likhet | aṣṭāsyaṃ catuścaraṇaṃ bhujaṣoḍaśabhūṣitaṃ caturviṃśatinetrādyaṃ | paścād ācāryo 'dhyātmakrūracetasā mantraṃ japed vijane deśe |
oṃ ghuru ghuru ghuḍu ghuḍu masa masa ghaṭa ghaṭa ghoṭaya ghoṭaya anantakṣobhakarāya nāgādhipataye he he ru ru ka saptapātālagatān nāgān karṣaya karṣaya varṣaya varṣaya garjaya garjaya phuḥ phuḥ phuḥ phuḥ phuḥ phuḥ phuḥ phuḥ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā |
yadi na varṣanti tadā etan mantraṃ viparītaṃ japet | varṣanti | yadi na varṣanti tadā mūrdhā sphuṭati yathārjakasyeva mañjarī | varṣāyanavidhiḥ || (20)

meghānāṃ sphāṭanaṃ vakṣye | śmaśānakarpaṭa upaviśya mantrajapena sphāṭayet |
oṃ āryaśmaśānapriyāya hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā |
meghasphāṭanavidhiḥ || (21)

parasainyavināśāya khaṭikāsādhanaṃ vakṣye | khaṭikāṃ piṣṭvā pañcāmṛtena kuṭhāracchinnayā sārdhaṃ vatikāṃ kārayet | mantraḥ
oṃ vajrakartari hevajrāya hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ |
siddhyarthaṃ koṭiṃ japet | pūrvasevāṃ lakṣaṃ japet | tāṃ sādhyakamaṇḍalugrīvāṃ veṣṭayet | veṣṭayitvā bhañjayet | sarve śatravaḥ śirohīnā bhavanti | vajrakartarividhiḥ || (22)

devān sphāṭayitukāmena tilakaṃ sādhanīyaṃ | brahmabījaṃ puṣyasādhitaṃ kuṭhārachinnāmiśritaṃ sūryagrāse akṣobhyena piṣayet | piṣṭvā pa<ra>śuṃ saṃskaret | taṃ pādenākramya mantraṃ japet |
oṃ vajrakuṭhāra pāṭaya 2 hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā |
koṭiṃ japya tilakaṃ vandayet | yaṃ ca lagati sa sphuṭati | devatāsphāṭanavidhiḥ || (23)

tāpajvalaṃ kartukāmena | arkadale viṣarājikāravaṇacitrakarasena śatror nāma likhet | tuṣāgnau nikṣipet | mantram ayutaṃ japet |
oṃ hevajra jvala 2 śatrūn bhruṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā |
ayutajāpena sidhyati || (24)
madyam udgiritukāmena sādhyasya nābhau maṃkāraṃ bhāvayet | maṃkāraniṣpannaṃ madyodaraṃ vibhāvayet | vāntikurvan dṛṣyate | madyam udgirati || (25)

pramādāṃ vaśīkartukāmena aśokāṣṭamyām aśokatalaṃ gatvā raktavastraṃ paridhāya madanaphalaṃ bhakṣayet | kāmācikārasena tilakaṃ vandya mantraṃ japet |
oṃ hrīḥ amukī me vaśībhavatu svāhā |
ayutajāpenāgacchati || (26)

candrasūryau vaśīkartukāmena śālipiṣṭakamayaṃ candrārkaṃ kṛtvā vajrodake nikṣipet | mantraṃ japet |
oṃ candrārka mācala mācala tiṣṭha tiṣṭha hevajrāya hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā |
saptakoṭiṃ japet | tiṣṭhate | candrasūryaṃ rātriṃdivāviśeṣakaṃ bhavati | iti candrasūryavidhāraṇavidhiḥ || (27)

oṃ nagrā nagrā
ity anena mantreṇa vikālavelāyāṃ kumāryā 'rthasādhanārthaṃ cakṣuṣy aṣṭottaraśatenābhimantrya puṣpadhūpadīpānāṃ pañcopacāreṇa saṃpūjya nimantrayet | caturdaśyām aṣṭamyāṃ vā prabhātakāle kalaśādikaṃ saṃsthāpya tailam alaktakarasaṃ cānenaiva mantreṇāṣṭottaraśatavārān abhimantrayet | paścād abhimantritālaktakarasena mantriṇo vṛddhāṅguṣṭhaṃ makṣayitvā tailenāpi snāpya kumāryān darśayet | vada kena mama dravyam apahṛtam iti | tatra sa kathayati | amukeneti | vajrajyotiṣo naṣṭadravyānveṣaṇavidhiḥ || (28)
oṃ veḍuyā veḍuyā ity ukte hastī palāyate | (29)
oṃ marmā marmā ity ukte vyāghraḥ palāyate | (30)
oṃ teliyā teliyā ity ukte gaṇḍhā palāyate | (31)
ili mili phuḥ phuḥ ity ukte sarpaḥ palāyate | (32)
dhanapālavaineyahastena hastaṃ darśayet | śvā palāyate | (33)

lg.l: vajrā gaurī ca vārī ca vajraḍākī nairātmikā ||

div.p: mantrapaṭalo dvitīyaḥ ||

lg.l: prathamaṃ bhāvayen maitrīṃ dvitīye karuṇāṃ tathā ||

tasmāt punar api
prathamaṃ śūnyatābodhiṃ dvitīyaṃ bījasaṃgrahaṃ ||

tataḥ
svahṛdi bhāvayed rephaṃ tadbhavaṃ sūryamaṇḍalaṃ ||
athavā nīlāruṇābhaṃ ca bhāvayec chandayā khalu || (7)
pukkasī vajrahastā ca śavarī rasadharī tathā ||
caṇḍālī ḍamaruṃ vādya etābhiḥ pūjyate prabhuḥ ||
sa eva sattva ity āhuḥ paramānandasvabhāvako || (11)
cakrī kuṇḍala kaṇṭhī ca haste rūcaka mekhalā ||
vāme vajrakapālaṃ ca khaṭvāṅgaṃ cāpi vāmataḥ ||

div.p: caturbhujaś caturmāranirjitaviśuddhitaḥ | pūrvoktavarṇarūpo hūṃbhavaḥ prathamavāmabhuje narakapālaṃ devāsurānāṃ raktena pūritaṃ prathamadakṣiṇabhuje vajraṃ śeṣadvibhujābhyāṃ prajñāliṅgitaḥ | vajravārāhī prajñā bhagavadrūpiṇī || (17)

ṣaḍbhujas trimukho | vāmaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ candrāruṇābhaṃ prathamaṃ nīlaṃ | nagnoḥ pūrvoktavarṇarūpo | bhujānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāviśuddhiḥ | prathamavāmabhuje triśūlaṃ prathamadakṣiṇabhuje vajraṃ vāmadvitīyabhuje ghaṇṭhā dakṣiṇadvitīyabhuje kartiḥ | śeṣadvibhujābhyāṃ vajraśṛṅkhalāsamāpannaḥ | yadvad bhagavān tadvat prajñā | savyāvasavye kartṛkapālaṃ | traidhātukātmakamṛtakākrāntaḥ || (18)
sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittahevajradevatāpaṭalas tṛtīyaḥ ||

devatābhiṣekapaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
svahṛdi svabījād raśmiṃ niścārya kṛṣṇadīptayā 'ṅkuśākārayā traidhātukavyavasthitān buddhān ākṛṣyāṣṭamātṛbhiḥ saṃpūjyānunāyayati | (1)
oṃ abhiṣiñcantu māṃ sarvatathāgatā
iti
tair buddhair herukākārarūpaiḥ pañcāmṛtabhṛtaiḥ pañcatathāgatātmakaiḥ kalaśaiḥ pañcabhir abhiṣicyate abhiṣicyamāne puṣpavṛṣṭir bhavati | dundubhiśabda uccalati kuṅkumavṛṣṭir bhavati | (2)

rūpavajrādibhiḥ saṃpūjyate | vajragītyo locanādibhir gīyante | abhiṣicyamāne mūrdhni svakuleśo bhavati | etena heruko niṣpannaḥ trisaṃdhyādhiṣṭhānabhāvanāṃ vibhāvyottiṣṭhet | devatāmūrtyā sthātavyaṃ || (3)
abhiṣekapaṭalaś caturthaḥ ||

atha tattvapaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | svarūpeṇa
nāsti rūpaṃ na draṣṭā ca na śabdo nāpi śrotā ca ||
na gandho nāpi ghrātā ca na raso nāpi rāsakaḥ ||
na sparśo nāpi spraṣṭā ca na cittaṃ nāpi caittikaṃ || (1)

lg.l: jananīṃ bhaginīṃ caiva pūjayed yogavit sadā ||
naṭīṃ ca rajakīṃ vajrāṃ caṇḍālīṃ brāhmaṇīṃ tathā ||
sevitavyāḥ prayatnena yathā bhedo na jāyate ||
vajra padma tathā karma tathāgata ratnaiva ca ||
vajre ḍombī bhaven mudrā padme nartī tathaiva ca ||
karmaṇi rajaky āhyātā brāhmaṇī ca tathāgate || (6)
tathatāyāṃ gataḥ śrīmān āgataś ca tathaiva ca ||
kulāni ṣaḍvidhāny āhuḥ saṃkṣepeṇa tu pañcadhā ||
nāsti bhāvako na bhāvo 'sti mantran nāsti na devatā ||
brahmā viṣṇuḥ śivaḥ sarvo vibuddhas tattvam ucyate || (12)
brahmā nirvṛtito buddhaḥ viṣanād viṣṇur ucyate ||
śivaḥ sadā sukalyāṇāt sarvaḥ sarvātmani sthitaḥ || (13)
satsukhatvena tattvaṃ ca vibuddho bodhanāt rateḥ ||
jananī bhaṇyate prajñā janayati yasmāj jagat ||
bhaginīti tathā prajñā vibhāgaṃ darśayed yathā || (16)
rajakīti duhitā ca nartakī ca prakathyate ||
guṇasya duhanāt prajñā duhitā ca nigadyate ||
asparśā bhagavatī yasmāt tasmād ḍombī prakathyate || (18)
maṇḍalaṃ pādalekhaḥ syān malanād maṇḍalam ucyate || (19)
tad dhyeyaṃ cintitaṃ yac ca dhyeyaṃ yasmād vicintanaṃ || (20)
pitari prāptaṃ yat saukhyaṃ tat sukhaṃ bhujyate svayaṃ ||
maraṇaṃ yena sukhena tat sukhaṃ dhyānam ucyate || (21)

div.p: tattvapaṭalaḥ pañcamaḥ ||

lg.l: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi caryāṃ pāraṅgatāṃ varāṃ ||
kaṭyāṃ vā mekhalaṃ caiva pādayor nūpuran tathā ||
ekavṛkṣe śmaśāne vā bhāvanā kathyate śubhā ||
kiñcid uṣme tu saṃprāpte caryāṃ kartuṃ yadīṣyate ||
siddhiṃ gantuṃ yadīcchāsti caryayā tv anayā caret || (7)
vajrakanyām imāṃ gṛhya caryāṃ kartuṃ vibudhyate || (8)
yadi [gītaṃ] gīyata ānandāt tarhi vajrānvitaṃ paraṃ ||
tarhi vajrapade nāṭyaṃ kuryād yogī samāhitaḥ || (10)
mantra[vi]śuddhyā sthitā gītā nartanā bhāvanā smṛtā ||
tasmād gītañ ca nāṭyañ ca kuryād yogī sadā sadā || (13)
bhakṣitavyan tu bhaiṣajyaṃ pātavyaṃ vāri nityatām ||
jarāmṛtyur na bādheta rakṣābhūtaḥ sadā bhavet || (14)
lobhaṃ mohaṃ bhayaṃ krodhaṃ vrīḍākāryañ ca varjayet ||
nidrām ātmānam utsṛjya caryāṃ kuryān na saṃśayaḥ || (18)
śarīraṃ dānaṃ datvā ca paścāc caryāṃ samārabhet ||
bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ tathā pānaṃ yathāprāptaṃ tu bhakṣayet ||
gamyāgamyan tathā mantrī vikalpan naiva kārayet || (21)
śakratulyo 'pi yo daityaḥ purato bhavati niścitaṃ ||
bhayaṃ tatra na kurvīta siṃharūpeṇa paryaṭet || (25)

div.p: caryāpaṭalaḥ ṣaṣṭaḥ ||

atha chomāpaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ ||
yena vijñāyate bhrāta bhaginī ca na saṃśayaḥ || (1)

lg.l: aṅgulīṃ darśayed yas tu āgatam ity uktaṃ bhavet ||
anāmikāṃ tu yo dadyād dadyāt tasya kaniṣṭhikāṃ ||
madhyamān darśayed yas tu dadyāt tasya pradeṣikāṃ || (3)
anāmikān darśayed yas tu grīvāṃ tasya pradarśayet ||
paṭaṃ saṃdarśayed yas tu triśūlaṃ tasya darśayed || (4)
stanaṃ darśayed yas tu sīmān tasya pradarśayet ||
medinīṃ darśayed yas tu cakraṃ tasya pradarśayet || (5)
bhṛkuṭīṃ darśayed yas tu śikhāmokṣo vidhīyate ||
lalāṭaṃ darśayed yas tu pṛṣṭaṃ tasya pradarśayet || (6)
pādatalaṃ darśayed yas tu krīḍate kautukena tu ||
vadanti tatra yoginya aho putra mahākṛpa ||
yadi mālāhastan darśayanti tatra militavyam iti kathayanti || (8)
mālā<m a>bhipreṣitāṃ kṛtvā samaye tiṣṭha suvratā ||
yad <dhi> vadanti yoginyas tat sarvam <eva> kartavyaṃ || (9)

div.p:
vajragarbha uvāca | he bhagavan ke te melāpakasthānāḥ |
bhagavān āha |
<te> pīṭhañ copapīṭhañ ca kṣetropakṣetram eva ca ||
chandohañ copacchandohaṃ melāpakopamelāpakas tathā ||

lg.l: daśabhūmīśvaro nātha ebhir anyair na kathyate || (11)

div.p:
vajragarbha uvāca | he bhagavan ke te pīṭhādayaḥ |
bhagavān āha |
pīṭhaṃ jālandharaṃ khyātam oḍḍiyānaṃ tathaiva ca ||
pīṭhaṃ paurṇagiriś caiva kāmarūpan tathaiva ca || (12)

lg.l: upapīṭhaṃ mālavaṃ proktaṃ sindhur nagaram eva ca ||
upakṣetraṃ kulatā proktam arbudaś ca tathaiva ca ||
goḍāvarī hi mādriś ca upakṣetraṃ hi saṃkṣipet || (14)
lampākaṃ kāñcikaṃ caiva saurāṣṭraṃ ca tathaiva ca || (15)

div.p:
vajragarbha uvāca | he bhagavan ke te divasāḥ | bhagavān āha |
pretapakṣe caturdaśyām aṣṭamyāñ ca tathaiva ca || (20)

lg.l: dhvajaṃ śastrahataṃ caiva saptāvartañ ca bhakṣayet ||
kṛpām utpādya yatnena māraṇaṃ krīyate viduḥ || (21)
kṛpāhīnā na sidhyanti tasmāt kṛpām utpādayet ||

div.p:
tatraivaṃ mantavyaṃ |
dinas tu bhagavān vajrī naktaṃ prajñā ca bhaṇyate || (23)

lg.l: nākāryaṃ vidyate kiñcin nābhakṣyaṃ vidyate sadā ||
nācintyaṃ vidyate hy atra nāvācyaṃ yac chubhāśubhaṃ || (24)
yathātmani tathā sattve tathātmani <hy> ahaṃ paraṃ ||
yeṣāṃ yeṣāṃ ca jantūnāṃ piśitam aśnīyate budhaiḥ ||
te te sattvā vaśaṃ yānti vajrakapālayogataḥ || (28)

div.p: chomāpaṭalaḥ saptamaḥ ||

atha yoginīcakraṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
khadhātau bhagaṃ dhyātvā madhye kurvīta bhāvanāṃ ||
cakraṃ pūrvaṃ yathānyāyaṃ devatānāṃ yathodayaṃ || (1)

lg.l: paścān mārtaṇḍam ākrāntam dvayor melā mahat sukhaṃ ||
gauryādyāś ca bhavanty asmād varṇabhedaṃ paraṃ pṛthak || (11)
indre vajrā yame gaurī vāruṇyāṃ vāriyoginī |

bāhyapuṭe punar
gaurī caurī vetālī ca ghasmarī pukkasī tathā ||
śavarī caṇḍālī caiva aṣṭamī ḍombinī matā || (14)
adhovaty ūrdhvavaty eva khecarī bhūcarī smṛtā ||
cakrī kuṇḍala kaṇṭhī ca haste rūcaka mekhalā |
etena bhāvayec cakraṃ laghu siddhim avāpnuyāt |
prathame bhāvayet kṛṣṇāṃ dvitīye raktām eva ca || (22)
tṛtīye bhāvayet pītāṃ caturthe haritān tathā |
ṣaḍaṅgaṃ bhāvayed yogī viramāntaṃ punas tathā |
kramam utpattikaṃ caiva utpannakramam eva ca || (24)
khadhātāv iti padmeṣu jñānaṃ bhagam iti smṛtaṃ ||
yathodayaṃ bhavec chukraṃ dvaividyaṃ sahajaṃ tataḥ || (27)
yoṣit tāvad bhavet prajñā upāyaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
puṃsi tāvad <dhi> dvaividhyaṃ śukraṃ tasya sukhañ ca vā |
prajñāyāṃ ca yathā puṃsi śukraṃ tasya sukhañ ca vā || (29)
paramānandaṃ bhavaṃ proktaṃ nirvāṇaṃ ca virāgataḥ |
na rāgo na virāgaś ca madhyamaṃ nopalabhyate ||
nānyena kathyate sahajaṃ na kasminn api labhyate |
hīnaṃ sūkṣmapadārthaṃ tu utkṛṣṭaṃ bhāvam ucyate ||
sthiracalaṃ yāni tāni sarvāṇy etānīty evāhaṃ |
samaṃ tulyam iti proktaṃ tasya cakro rasaḥ smṛtaḥ |
madbhavaṃ hi jagat sarvaṃ madbhavaṃ bhuvanatrayaṃ |
madvyāpitam idaṃ sarvaṃ nānyamayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ jagat || (41)
evaṃ matvā tu vai yogī yo 'bhyāse susamāhitaḥ ||
sa sidhyati na sandeho mandapuṇyo 'pi mānavaḥ || (42)
khānapāne yathā snāne jāgrat supto 'pi cintayet |
bhāvyate hi jagat sarvaṃ manasā yasmān na bhāvyate |
teṣām ekaṃ paraṃ nāsti svasaṃvedyaṃ mahat sukhaṃ |
svasaṃvedyā bhavet siddhiḥ svasaṃvedyā hi bhāvanā || (46)
svayaṃ hartā svayaṃ kartā svayaṃ rājā svayaṃ prabhuḥ || (47)
rāgo dveṣas tathaiverśyā moho mānas tathaiva ca ||
sarve te tatpade ramye kalān nārghanti ṣoḍaśīṃ || (48)
śukrākāro bhaved bhagavān tatsukhaṃ kāminī smṛtaṃ |
pṛthivy āpaś ca vāyuś ca teja ākāśam eva ca ||
svargamartyaiś ca pātālair ekamūrtir bhavet kṣaṇāt ||
siddhir na syād bhavec chuddhyā punarjanma bhavāntare || (54)
na ca tena vinā siddhir iha loke paratra ca ||
na jñātaṃ yena hevajraṃ vyarthas tasya pariśramaḥ || (55)

div.p: yoginīcakro nāma mahāyoginīnāṃ melāpakapaṭalo 'ṣṭamaḥ

ataḥ paraṃ viśuddhipaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
sarveṣāṃ khalu vastūnāṃ viśuddhis tathatā smṛtā ||
paścād ekaikabhedena devatānān tu kathyate || (1)

lg.l: rūpaviṣayādi ye 'py anye pratibhāsante hi yoginaḥ ||
sarve te śuddhabhāvā hi yasmād buddhamayaṃ jagat || (4)

div.p:
he bhagavan ke te 'viśuddhāḥ |
bhagavān āha | rūpādayaḥ | kasmāt | grāhyagrāhakabhāvāt |
vajragarbha āha | ke te grāhyagrāhakāś ceti | (5)

bhagavān āha |
cakṣuṣā gṛhyate rūpaṃ śabdaḥ karṇena śrūyate ||
gandhaṃ nāsikayā veti jihvayā svādanaṃ viduḥ || (6)

lg.l: kāyena spṛśyate vastu manaḥ sukhādim āpnute ||
rūpaskandhe bhaved vajrā gaurī vedanāyāṃ smṛtā ||

div.p:
vijñānaskandharūpeṇa sthitā nairātmyayoginī ||
sadā tāsāṃ viśuddhyā vai sidhyanti tattvayoginaḥ ||
adhyātmapuṭaṃ | (9)

paścād bāhyapuṭaṃ vakṣye aparagauryādiyoginyaḥ |
aiśānyāṃ pukkasī khyātā agnau śavarī kīrtitā ||
nairṛtye sthāpya caṇḍālīṃ vāyave ḍombinī sthitā || (10)

lg.l: indre gaurī yame caurī vetālī vāruṇadiśi ||
kauvere ghasmarī caiva adhastād bhūcarī smṛtā || (11)
rūpe gaurī samākhyātā śabde caurī prakīrtitā ||
vetālī gandhabhāge ca rase ghasmarī kīrtitā || (13)
sparśe ca bhūcarī khyātā khecarī dharmadhātutaḥ ||
sadā hy āsāṃ viśuddhyā tu sidhyanti tattvayoginaḥ || (14)
pṛthivī pukkasī khyātā abdhātuḥ śavarī smṛtā ||
tejaś caṇḍāliṇī jñeyā vāyur ḍombī prakīrtitā || (16)
mogho vajrā tathā khyātā dveṣādīnāṃ tu śodhanaṃ ||
tena tu tena tu bandhanaṃ muñcet ||

tasmāt | (19)
gandha na śabda na rūpaṃ

div.p: viśuddhipaṭalo navamaḥ ||

lg.l: athavā yā kā yathālabdhā ṣoḍaśābdā tathaiva ca ||
tāvad dhi sevyate mudrā yāvac chukravatī bhavet || (6)
mudrāyāś ca mukhaṃ baddhvā upāyasya mukhaṃ tathā ||
sevayā tatra yad bhūtaṃ śiṣyavaktre nipātayet || (7)
sa eva prāṇināṃ prāṇaḥ sa eva paramākṣaraḥ ||
sa evāsau mahāprāṇaḥ sa evāsau jaganmayaḥ ||
bhāvābhāvau tadudbhūtau anyāni yāni tāni ca || (11)
sarvaṃ vijñānarūpaṃ ca puruṣaḥ purāṇa īśvaro ||
ātmā jīvaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca kālaḥ puḍgala eva ca ||
tṛtīyaṃ viramākhyaṃ ca caturthaṃ sahajaṃ sṛtaṃ || (13)
evaṃ śrutvā tu vai sarve vajragarbhādayo budhāḥ ||
viramānandaṃ jagac caiva na vidyate sahajaṃ triṣu || (15) iti ||
na rāgo na virāgaś ca madhyamaṃ nopalabhyate ||
trayāṇāṃ varjanād eva sahajaṃ bodhir ucyate || (17)
prathamaṃ meghavad bhāti siddhe tu māyāvad bhavet ||
ity āha maṇḍalaṃ śāstā catuṣkoṇaṃ samujjvalaṃ || (20)
dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ tathā gandham aṣṭakalaśādibhir yutaṃ || (22)
baliṃ ca dāpayet tatra prāg akārādimantrataḥ ||
rakṣāṃ caiva yathādiṣṭāṃ yathā dhyāne tathātra ca || (26)
prakāśitās tu ye sekā vidhivad dadyāt svamaṇḍale ||
pūjā cābhyarcanā caiva yathākhyātā tathātra ca || (27)
śuddhaṃ dvipuṭam ālikhya cakraṃ gauryādīnāṃ tatha ||
pūrveṇa likhet kartṛkāṃ dakṣiṇe paścime tathā || (28)
uttare cāgnikoṇe ca nairṛtye vāyave tathā ||
aiśāne ca yathākhyātam adhaś cordhvaṃ tathā tathā || (29)
paramaratau na ca bhāva na bhāvaka ||
na ca vigraha na ca grāhya na grāhaka ||
māṃsa na śoṇita viṣṭa na mūtraṃ ||
na charda na moha na śaucapavitraṃ || (33)
rāga na dveśa na moha na īrṣyā ||
na ca paiśunya na ca māna na dṛśyaṃ ||
bhāva na bhāvaka mitra na śatru ||

div.p:
ity āha vajragarbhākhyaḥ [he bhagavan] kasmād bhūtātmakaṃ bhavet |||
dehaṃ svabhāvataḥ śuddham ādāv evāsvabhāvakaṃ || (35)
vajragarbha āha || he bhagavan kasmān mahābhautikaskandhaḥ ||

lg.l: bhagavān āha | (37) bolakakkolayogena kunduruṃ kurute vratī ||
gharṣaṇād jāyate tejo gamanād vāyuḥ prakīrtitaḥ || (39)
tasmāt saukhyaṃ na tattvākhyaṃ mahābhūtaṃ yataḥ sukhaṃ || (40)
sahajātyāṃ yad utpannaṃ sahajaṃ tat prakīrtitaṃ ||
na mantrajāpo na tapo na homo
na maṇḍaleyaṃ na ca maṇdalañ ca ||
sa mantrajāpaḥ sa tapaḥ sa homas

div.p: abhiṣekapaṭalo daśamaḥ ||

lg.l: samākrūrā lalāṭī ca pātanā kathitā sadā ||
vaśyā vāmāśritā dṛṣṭiḥ puttalī dvau ca vāmataḥ || (1)
ākṛṣṭir dakṣiṇe bhāge puttalī dvau <hi> cordhvataḥ ||
bhrāntir atra na kartavyā ācintyā <hi> buddharddhayaḥ || (5)
māraṇaṃ nātra kāryaṃ syāt samayabhedaḥ paraṃ bhavet || (6)
sarvākāryaṃ tu kartavyaṃ hitvā sattvasya vañcanāṃ ||
nādiṃ gādiṃ tathā hādim antaśvam ādiśvaṃ ca vā || (8)
saptāvartan tato lakṣet hevajroktais tu lakṣaṇaiḥ || (9)
saptacchāyā bhavet tasya dṛṣṭvā yogī tu lakṣayet ||
atha kurukullāyāḥ sādhanaṃ vakṣye yena sarvasattvāni vaśaṃ yānti ||

div.p: śrīhevajraḍākinījālasamvaravajragarbhābhisaṃbodhināma prathamaḥ kalparājā samāptaḥ ||

atha vajragarbha āha |
deśayantu yathānyāyaṃ pratiṣṭhālakṣaṇaṃ śubhaṃ ||
bhagavān vajrasārātmā sarvabuddhaikasaṃgrahaḥ || (1)

bhagavān āha |
homaṃ kṛtvā yathāproktaṃ vartayitvā tu maṇḍalaṃ ||
pradoṣe saṃskaret pratimāṃ kṛtvādhivāsanādikaṃ || (2)

lg.l: śāntike vartulaṃ kuṇḍaṃ caturasvaṃ tu pauṣṭike ||
trikoṇaṃ māraṇe proktaṃ śeṣān atraiva sādhayet || (6)
dvihastam ekahastañ ca adhordhve pauṣṭikaṃ mataṃ || (7)
viṃśatyaṅgulam ardhaṃ ca adhordhve māraṇaṃ bhavet ||
śukravarṇaṃ bhavec chāntau pītan tu pauṣṭike tathā || (8)
māraṇe kṛṣṇavarṇañ ca vaśye raktaṃ prakīrtitaṃ ||
yathā vaśye tathākṛṣṭau dveṣādau yathā māraṇe || (9)
tīlaṃ śāntau dadhi puṣṭau māraṇe kaṇṭhakaṃ tathā ||
dveṣādau kaṇṭhakaṃ proktaṃ vaśya ākṛṣṭau cotpalaṃ || (10)

div.p:
oṃ agnaye mahātejaḥ sarvakāmaprasādhaka ||
kāruṇyakṛtasatvārtha asmin sannihito bhava ||
agnyāvāhanamantraḥ || (11)
div.lg:
svārthañ caiva parārthañ ca sādhituṃ gaccha havyabhuk ||
āgamiṣyasi yathākāle sarvasiddhiṃ kuruṣva me ||
agnisantoṣaṇamantraḥ || (13)

lg.l: oṃ jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hāḥ khaṃ raṃ | arghamantraḥ |
oṃ nī rī hūṃ khaḥ | pādyamantraḥ |

div.p: homanirṇayapratiṣṭhāpaṭalaḥ prathamaḥ ||

lg.l: kṣaṇam apy anyacittaḥ san na tiṣṭhet siddhikāṅkṣakaḥ || (2)
candanair hastaṃ mardayan kaupinaiś chādayan kaṭiṃ || (5)
niḥsaraṃ bhāṣayan bhāṣāṃ gacchan tiṣṭhan ruṣan hasan ||
bhagavatīṃ sevayet prājño yoginīṃ bhāvayed vratī || (6)
na sthātavyaṃ buddhair yatnāt siddhyarthaṃ siddhikāṅkṣibhiḥ || (7)
kathaṃ te kṣaṇam apy ekaṃ yoginaḥ santi raurave || (12)
api tu ye janmahīnā ye mūrkhāḥ krūrakarmiṇaḥ || (13)
kurūpā vikalagātrāś ca siddhyante te 'pi cintayā ||
māsam ekaṃ cared guptaṃ yāvat mudrā na labhyate ||
gṛhītvā amukīṃ mudrāṃ sattvārthaṃ kuru vajradhṛk ||
māsam ekena bhavyā sā bhaven naivātra saṃśayaḥ || (19)
athavā cātmanaḥ śaktyā kṛṣṭvā mudrāṃ prakalpayet || (20)
tāñ ca gṛhya carec caryām ātmano dhairyapratyayāt || (21)
na caryā bhogataḥ proktā yā khyātā bhīmarūpiṇī ||
mudrayā mudrayā dhvābhyāṃ mudrāsiddhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet || (23)
tīradvayaṃ bhavet ghaṇṭhā kiñjalkaṃ bolakaṃ bhavet ||
upāyaḥ saṃbhavo yasmāl layaṃ prajñā bhavāntakī || (27)
tena pralayan nāsyāsti utpādo naiva tatvataḥ ||
pralayāntīyate kaścil layābhāvān na ca kṣayaḥ || (28)
yathā māyā yathā svapnaṃ yathā syād antarābhavaṃ ||
sukhaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ sukhaṃ pītaṃ sukhaṃ raktaṃ sukhaṃ sitaṃ ||
sukhaṃ śyāmaṃ sukhaṃ nīlaṃ sukhaṃ kṛtsnaṃ carācaraṃ || (32)
sukhaṃ prajñā sukhopāyaḥ sukhaṃ kundurujaṃ tathā ||
dehābhāve kutaḥ saukhyaṃ saukhyaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate ||
yathā puṣpāśritaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpābhāvān na gamyate ||
māṃ na jānanti ye mugdhāḥ kausīdyopahatāś ca ye || (37)
vyākhyātāham ahaṃ dharmaḥ śrotāhaṃ sugaṇair yutaḥ ||
sādhyo 'haṃ jagataḥ śāstā loko 'haṃ laukiko 'py ahaṃ || (39)
tathā ca pratyayaṃ putra andhakāre pradīpavat || (40)
vinā tena na saukhyaṃ syāt sukhaṃ hitvā bhaven na saḥ ||
tasmād buddho na bhāvaḥ syād abhāvarūpo 'pi naiva saḥ ||
tasmāt sahajaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sahajaṃ svarūpam ucyate ||
karṇe toyaṃ yathā viṣṭaṃ prati toyena kṛṣyate ||
yathā pāvakadagdhāś ca svidyante vahninā punaḥ ||
yena yena hi badhyante jantavo raudrakarmaṇā ||
viparītabhāvanā hy eṣā na jñātā buddhatīrthikaiḥ || (51)
eka eva mahānandaḥ pañcatāṃ yānti bhedanaiḥ || (52)
bodhicittaṃ dravaṃ yasmād dravaṃ abdhātukaṃ mataṃ ||
sukhaṃ rāgaṃ bhaved raktaṃ raktir ākāśalakṣaṇaṃ ||
ekam eva mahac cittaṃ pañcarūpeṇa saṃsthitaṃ ||

div.p: hevajre ḍākinījālāsaṃvare siddhinirṇayo nāma dvitīyaḥ paṭalaḥ |

lg.l: atha vajrī sarvatantranidānaṃ nāmopayaṃ yoginīnāṃ kathayām āsa |
saṃvaraṃ cābhiṣekañ ca saṃdhyābhāṣaṃ tathaiva ca ||
abhiṣekāj jñāyate samyag evaṃkāraṃ mahat sukhaṃ || (2)
atha bhagavantaṃ vajrasattvaṃ yoginya evam āhuḥ |
evaṃkāraṃ kim ucyate ḍākinīnān tu saṃvaraṃ ||
vicitraṃ ca vipākaṃ ca vimardo vilakṣaṇaṃ tathā ||
vimardam ālocanaṃ proktaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti ca ||
ācārya guhya prajñā ca caturthan tat punas tathā ||
hasitaśuddhyā tv ācārya īkṣaṇe guhyakas tathā ||
prajñā <hi> pāṇyāvāptau ca tat punar dvandvatantrake || (11)
pāṇibhyāṃ tu samāliṅgya prajñāṃ vai śoḍaśābdikāṃ ||
śāstā brūyāt mahāsattva gṛhna mudrāṃ sukhāvahāṃ ||
śāstā tam ājñāpayati kunduraṃ kuru vajradhṛk ||
mudrāyuktaṃ guruṃ dṛṣṭvā stutipūjāṃ karet yathā ||
yathā yūyaṃ mahātmano mamāpi kuru tad vibho || (19)
śāstā brūyāt mahāsattva dhāraṇīyaṃ mahat sukhaṃ || (22)
yāvad ā bodhiparyantaṃ sattvārthaṃ kuru vajradhṛk ||
ity evaṃ vadate vajrī śiṣyaṃ vīkṣyā kṛpācayaṃ || (23)
sthiracalaṃ vyāpya saṃtiṣṭhet māyārūpi ca bhāti ca ||

p.l: atha sarvayoginīnāṃ bhaginīnāṃ mṛṣitvā vajragarbo bhagavantaṃ evaṃ āha ||

lg.l: maṇḍalaṃ sāram ity uktaṃ bodhicittaṃ mahat sukhaṃ ||
ādānan tat karotīti maṇḍalaṃ malanaṃ mataṃ || (27)
prāṇinaś ca tvayā ghātyā vaktavyaṃ ca mṛṣāvacaḥ ||
adattañ ca tvayā grāhyaṃ sevanaṃ parayoṣitaḥ || (29)
ekacittaṃ prāṇivadhaṃ [proktaṃ] prāṇa cittaṃ yato mataṃ ||
ke punas te viṣayāḥ kānīndriyāṇi kim āyatanaṃ kathame skandhāḥ || ke punas te dhātavaḥ || eṣāṃ kiṃ svabhāvaṃ || (31)
rūpa śabdas tathā gandho rasa sparśas tathaiva ca ||
dharmadhātusvabhāvaś ca ṣaḍ ete viṣayā matāḥ || (32)
cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca ghrāṇañ ca jihvā kāyo manas tathā ||
indriyaṃ viṣayaṃ caiva indriyavijñānam eva ca ||
svabhāvam ādyanutpannaṃ na satyaṃ na mṛṣā tathā ||

div.p:
tad yathā kāṇḍañ ca mathanīyaṃ ca puruṣahastavyāyāmañ ca pratītyākasmād agnir upajāyate || asāv agnir na kāṇḍe tiṣṭhati || na mathanīye na puruṣahastavyāyāme || sarvākārataḥ parigaveṣyamānaḥ || ekasminn api
nāsti sa cāgnir na satyaṃ na mṛṣā || evaṃ sarvadharmān yoginyo manasikuruta || (37)
atha nairātmyayoginīpramukhāḥ sarvavajraḍākinyaḥ pañcāmṛtaṃ gṛhītvā samayadravyañ ca bhagavantaṃ vajrasattvaṃ pūjayanti | kunduruyogenānurāgayanti pibayanti ca vajrāmṛtarasaṃ | (38)

lg.l: tataḥ paścād bhagavāṃs tuṣṭe sati adhiṣṭhānaṃ darśayanti |
mayā guptīkṛtaṃ tattvaṃ sarvair buddhair namaskṛtaṃ ||

div.p: atha utsāhaprāptāḥ sarvā devyo dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ śṛṇvanti | (40)

lg.l: khānaṃ pāṇaṃ yathāprāptaṃ gamyāgamyaṃ na varjayet ||
snānaṃ śaucaṃ na kurvīta grāmyadharmaṃ na varjayet || (41)
mantran naiva japed dhīmān dhyānaṃ naivāvalambayet ||
mitrasnehaṃ na kurvīta dviṣṭe dveṣaṃ tathā na ca ||
pañcāmṛtaṃ guḍaṃ madyaṃ viṣaṃ nimbaṃ prasūtajaṃ ||
kaupinaṃ viśvavarṇañ ca mṛcchārair bhūṣaṇan tathā ||
puṣpaṃ pretālaye prāpya bandhayen mūrddhajaṃ varaṃ || (49)
ghrāṇer mātsaryakī khyātā vaktre ca rāgavajrikā || (51)
sandhyābhāṣaṃ kim ucyeta bhagavān bobrūta niścitaṃ ||
hasitaṃ cekṣaṇābhyān tu āliṅgaṃ dvandakais tathā ||
tantreṇāpi caturṇāṃ ca saṃdhyābhāṣaṃ na śabditaṃ || (54)
vakṣyāmy ahaṃ vajragarbha śṛṇu tvam ekacetasā ||
madanaṃ madyaṃ balaṃ māṃsaṃ malayajaṃ milanaṃ mataṃ ||
gatiḥ kheṭaḥ śavaḥ śrāyo asthyābharaṇaṃ niraṃśukaṃ || (56)
āgatiḥ preṅkhaṇaṃ proktaṃ kṛpīṭaṃ ḍamarukaṃ mataṃ ||
abhavyaṃ dunduraṃ khyātaṃ bhavyaṃ kāliñjaram mataṃ || (57)
gūthaṃ catuḥsamaṃ proktaṃ mūtraṃ kasturikā smṛtā ||
svayaṃbhu sihlakaṃ jñeyaṃ śukraṃ karpūrakaṃ mataṃ || (59)
vajraṃ bolakaṃ khyātaṃ padma kakkolakaṃ mataṃ || (60)
ḍombī vajrakulī khyātā naṭī padmakulī tathā ||
caṇḍālī ratnakulī caiva dvijā tāthāgatī matā || (62)
rajakī karmakulī caiva etā mudrāḥ susiddhidā ||
āsāṃ śukraṃ bhaved vajraṃ pūjayitvā pibed vratī || (63)
vajragarbha mahāsattva yan mayā kathitaṃ tvayi ||
tat sarvaṃ sādaraṃ grāhyaṃ sandhyābhāṣaṃ mahādbhutaṃ || (64)
mṛyate 'sau yadi buddho 'pi saṃdhyābhāṣān na bhāṣayet || (66)
svasamayavidāṃ prāpya yadi na bhāṣed idaṃ vacaḥ ||

div.p: hevajrasarvatantranidhānasandhyābhāṣo nāma tṛtīyaḥ paṭalaḥ ||

p.l: atha vajragarbhapramukhāḥ sarvaḍākinyaḥ saṃśayaprāptā daurmanasprāptā bhagavantaṃ vajrasattvam evam āhuḥ |

lg.l: caryāpaṭale yad ākhyātaṃ gītaṃ nāṭyañ ca siddhidaṃ |
tatra saṃdeho me vartate kiṃ gītaṃ nāṭyañ ca kiṃ || (2)
tatra saṃdeho me vartate kiṃ mudryaṃ kasya mudraṇaṃ || (3)
mantrapaṭale yat proktaṃ nairātmyādeś ca bījakaṃ |
tatra me bhrāntiḥ saṃjātā kiṃ bījaṃ kasya bījakaṃ || (4)
viśuddhiṃ tāsāṃ kathayantu bhagavanto bhrāntir me 'bhūt || (5)
ghaṇa kibiḍa ho vājjaï karuṇe kiaï na rolā (6)
tahi baru khājjaï gāḍe maanā pijjaï
hale kāliñjara paṇiaï dunduru tahi vajjiaï
preṃkhaṇa kheṭa karante śuddhāśuddha na muṇiaï
niraṃsua aṃga caḍābī tahiṃ ja sarāba paṇiaï
malayaje kunduru bāṭaï ḍiṇḍima tahiṇ ṇa vajjiaï (8)
vajradharmais tathā buddhair yoginībhiś ca mātṛbhiḥ |
anenaiva vaśaṃ loke mantrajāpaṃ tv anena tu || (11)
sādaraṃ gīyate yatra sādaraṃ yatra nṛtyate |
gaṇādhyakṣaṃ puraskṛtyaṃ tatra ghrāṇan tu lakṣayet || (12)
laśunaṃ prathamaṃ gandhaṃ gṛdhragandhaṃ tataḥ punaḥ |
gomāyor api śabdañ ca bāhyodyāne tu lakṣayet || (14)
mudraṇaṃ liṅgaṇāṅkaṃ ca aṅkena lakṣate kulaṃ |
vyasta kulaṃ bhāvanāyogān na siddhi nāpi sādhakaḥ || (15)
ḍombīṃ rāgamudreṇa punar gaurīñ ca dveṣataḥ |
pañcamaṃ vajraḍākī ca ṣaṣṭamaṃ pukkasī matā|
śavarī saptamaṃ caiva caṇḍālī aṣṭamaṃ smṛtā|| (21)
navamaṃ ḍombinī caiva punar gaurī dvipañcakaṃ|
caurī ekādaśaṃ khyātaṃ vetālī dvādaśaṃ mataṃ|| (22)
sarvaśeṣāṃ tyajed yatnāt ṣoḍaśī na kalā yataḥ|| (25)
karpūraṃ kin na vai tyājyaṃ sarvayoginīsaṃbhavaṃ|
bhagavān āha|| evam etad yathā vadasi||
evam eva tu saṃsāraṃ nirvāṇam evam eva tu|
saṃsārād ṛte nānyan nirvāṇam iti kathyate|| (32)
amī dharmās tu nirvāṇaṃ mohāt saṃsārarūpiṇaḥ|
madanaṃ pāyayet tasyāṃ svayañ caiva pibet tataḥ|
kakkole bolakaṃ kṣiptvā kunduruṃ kurute vratī|
tasmin yoge samudbhūtaṃ karpūraṃ na tyajed budhaḥ|| (38)
na kareṇa tato gṛhyet śuktikayā na śaṅkhakaiḥ|
amṛtaṃ jihvayā grāhyam edhanāya balasya vai|| (39)
na sā dīrghā na sā hrasvā na caturasrā na vartulā ||
tasyām utpadyate yogī tasyāḥ saukhyaṃ bhunakti ca ||
rūpaṃ śabdas tathā gandho rasaḥ sparśas tathaiva ca ||
bhagavatā kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ samvaraṃ kathayasva me || (48)
yathā bāhyaṃ tathādhyātmaṃ samvaraṃ tat prakāśitaṃ || (49)
tatra nirmāṇakāyaḥ syān nirmāṇaṃ sthāvaraṃ mataṃ || (53)
dharmaś cittasvarūpan tu dharmakāyo hṛdi bhavet || (54)
sambhogaṃ bhuñjanaṃ proktaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ vai rasarūpiṇaṃ ||
yathā kṛtaṃ tathā bhuktaṃ niṣyanda iti śabditam ||
vipākaṃ tadviparyāsaṃ karmaṇy alpe mahat phalaṃ ||
sthāvarī nirmāṇacakre tu nirmāṇaṃ sthāvaraṃ yataḥ ||
saṃvidī saṃbhogacakre ca kaṇṭhe saṃvedanaṃ yataḥ ||
mahāsaṅghī mahāsukhacakre ca mahāsukhaṃ ke sthitaṃ yataḥ || (60)
nikāya kāyam ity uktam udāraṃ vihāram ucyate ||
ābhiḥ sāmāgribhiḥ sattvā buddhā eva na saṃśayaḥ ||

div.p: atha sarvā devyo nairātmyayoginīpramukhāḥ || tadyathā|| locanā māmakī ca pāṇḍurā ca tārā ca bhṛkuṭī ca cundā ca parṇaśavarī ca ahomukhā ca || evaṃ pramukhāḥ sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamā yoginyaḥ paramavismayam āpannā || (65) etāṃ bhāratīṃ śrutvā mūrcchitāḥ santrastā avanau patitā || dhūnaprāptāḥ tāḥ sarvadevīr dṛṣṭvā saṃstauti vajrī punar utthāpanāya ca || (66)

lg.l: khiti jala pavaṇa hūtāsānaha tumhe bhāīṇi devī
sunaha pavañcami tatum ahu jo ṇa jānaī kovi || (67)
svapnavad bhagavato vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvās tā jīvaprāptā abhuvan || (68)
sattvā buddhā eva kiṃ tu āgantukamalāvṛtāḥ ||
tasyāpakarṣanāt sattvā buddhā eva na saṃśayaḥ || (69)
evam etad bhagavan satyaṃ na mṛṣā|||
ghasmaï garalaha bhakkhāṇahi jo nicceḍya ṇa loa ||
mohavaïvarjitā tatumaṇa tatva para tuṭua soa || (71)
avidyādyair na gṛhyante na ca mohādibandanaiḥ || (72)
abuddho nāsti sattvaikaḥ saṃbodhāt svasya svasya ca ||
na jānanti yataḥ saukhyaṃ devasyāpy asurasya ca || (74)
cittam eva hi saṃbuddho na buddho 'nyatra darśitaḥ || (75)
te 'pi hevajram āgamya sidhyante nātra saṃśayaḥ || (76)
saṃsaranti ca te mūḍhāḥ ṣaḍgatau bhavacārake || (77)
viśodhayanti viṣayān lapsyante te hy anuttaraṃ || (78)
mohaṃ yasmāt kakkhāṭatvaṃ kāyo vairocano mataḥ ||
kāyaṃ vihāya cittasya nānyatra lalitaṃ bhavet ||
tasmād vairocanaḥ cittaṃ kāyaṃ cittena mudrayet || (80)
cittaṃ vihāya kāyasya sthitir anyā na dṛśyate ||
tasmāc cittaṃ bhavet mohaṃ cittaṃ mohena mudrayet|| (82)
tejaś caṇḍālinī khyātā kathaṃ ratnena mudraṇaṃ ||
rāgo raktaṃ yataḥ khyātaṃ raktaṃ ca ratnasaṃbhavaḥ ||
rāgaṃ hitvā īrṣyāyā na syād anyatra saṃbhavaḥ ||
tasmād rāgasya mudreṇa ḍombinīṃ mudrayed budhaḥ || (86)
rūpaṃ yasmāt kakkhāṭatvaṃ gauryā vairocano mataḥ ||
caurīn tenaiva nyāyena vetālīñ ca tathaiva ca ||
ghasmarīñ ca tayā yuktyā mudraṇam aviparītataḥ || (88)
inda jama jala jakkha bhuta vahni vāyu rakkha
canda sujja māda bappa talapātāle aṭṭhasappa svāhā (91)
aṃbha kajja savva sādha khanti kuṇi pheḍa gāda || (92)

div.p: oṃ a-kāri mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇām ādyanutpannatvāt | oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā || (93)

lg.l: anena balinā yadi sarvabhūtān pūjāṃ prakurvanti śubhāya yoginaḥ |
bhavet tadā teṣu sukham anāvilaṃ devāś ca tuṣyanti jagatsubhūtayaḥ | (94)
śāntisukhaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ bhavet ca | dadyāt baliṃ yadīha bhūtagaṇāya śāśvataḥ || (95)
khecarī kena mudreṇa bhūcarī kasya mudrataḥ ||
kartavyaṃ mudraṇaṃ kathaṃ prāg na jñātaṃ mayā prabho (96)
cittaṃ madhyamakaṃ sthānaṃ nairātmyā tena madhyajā || (99)
trividhaṃ pañcavidhaṃ caiva kathyate śṛṇu yoginī|| (100)

div.p: akṣobhya vairocana ratnasambhava amitaprabha amoghasiddhi vajrasattvaḥ || dveṣa moha piśuna rāga īrṣyā saukhyaṃ || (101)
hevajrasarvatantramudraṇapiṇḍārtho nāma caturthaḥ paṭalaḥ ||

lg.l: atha vajrī mahārājā hevajraḥ sarvadaḥ prabhuḥ ||
tvadīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kīdṛk prāg na jñātaṃ mayā prabho || (4)
cumbayitvā tu nairātmyāṃ kṣiptvā vajraṃ kapālake ||
tatra madhe 'haṃ vidyate tvayā sārdhaṃ varāṇane ||
tvayā mayā pure ramye krīḍatā ratinirbharaiḥ ||
niḥsritya dakṣiṇe dvāre caurī sā dvārapālikā || (14)
uṭṭha bharāḍo karuṇamaṇḍa pukkasī mahu paritāhiṃ ||
tohyā vihuṇṇe marami hahuṃ uṭṭehiṃ tuhuṃ hevajja ||
loa nimantia suraapahu suṇṇe acchasi kīsa ||
hauṃ caṇḍāli viṇṇanami tai viṇṇa ḍahami na dīsa || (22)
indīālī uṭṭha tuhuṃ hauṃ jānāmi ttuha cittaḥ ||
ambhe ḍombī cheamaṇḍa mā kara karuṇavicchittaḥ || (23)
pṛthivī varuṇa vāyuś ca tejaś candrārka eva ca ||
caraṇān sphārayan bhūmau tarjayañ ca surāsurān || (27)
gaṃ caṃ vaṃ ghaṃ paṃ śaṃ laṃ ḍaṃ bījais tu sṛjed āsāṃ ||
mātṛcakre pure ramye bhāvayed īdṛśaṃ prabhuṃ ||
gauryā <hi> dakṣiṇe kartry avasavye rohitas tathā ||
kṛpītaṃ dakṣiṇe cauryā vāme pānau varāhakaṃ || (30)
pukkasyā dakṣiṇe siṃhaṃ vāme paraśus tathā ||
śavaryā dakṣiṇe bhikṣur vāme khiṅkhirikā tathā || (32)
caṇḍālyā dakṣiṇe cakraṃ vāmena lāṅgalaṃ tathā ||
ḍombhyā dakṣiṇe vajraṃ vame savyatarjanī tathā || (33)
caṇḍālī ca nabhaḥśyāmā ḍombī karcūrā matā || (36)
nairṛtir vemacitrī ca gauryādīnāṃ tu viṣṭaraṃ || (37)
bolakaṃ bhūṣayitvā tu bhagavantaṃ pūjya bhaktitaḥ ||
strīṇāṃ vaśyakaraṃ mantraṃ duṣṭāṇāṃ tarjanan tathā ||
tad ahaṃ kathayāmy eṣa śṛṇu devi sukhaṃdade ||
asya mantrasya yad bhūtaṃ vajrasattvena yat kṛtaṃ ||
bibhemi sutaraṃ devi uparodhāt tvayi kathyate || (41)

div.p: caturviṃśatinetrāya tadanu ṣoḍaśabhujāya kṛṣṇajīmūtavapuṣe kapālamālā[neka]dhāriṇe adhyāntakrūracittāya ardhendudaṃṣṭriṇe | (46)
māraya māraya kāraya kāraya garjaya garjaya tarjaya tarjaya śoṣaya śoṣaya saptasāgarān bandha bandha nāgāṣṭakān gṛhna gṛhna śatrūn ha hā hi hī hu hū he hai ho hau haṃ haḥ phaṭ svāhā || (47)

lg.l: tatas tuṣṭā tu sā devī manthamanthānayogataḥ ||
śāstā tatra mahājñānī maṇḍalam likhati svayaṃ ||
tanmadhye tu likhet padman aṣṭapatraṃ sakeśaraṃ ||
cakraṃ likhec ca nairṛtyāṃ vāyavyāṃ kuliśaṃ likhet || (53)
pūrvadvāre tathā kartrīṃ kṛpīṭaṃ dakṣiṇe likhet ||
paścime saṃlikhet kūrmam uragaṃ cottare tathā || (54)

div.p: kiṃ bahunā pralāpena yathā tattvasaṃgrahe maṇḍalavidhis tathā kartavyaṃ || (57)

lg.l: maṇḍale ca praveṣṭavyā vidyā cāṣṭau mahāsukhāḥ ||
mātulasya tathā bhāryā mātṛbhaginī ca śvasṛkā ||
pitur bhaginī tathā caiva aṣṭau vidhāḥ prakīrtitaḥ || (59)
karpūraṃ ca pibet tatra tena maṇḍalaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ || (60)
tāsāṃ pāyayed yogī laghu siddhim avāpnuyāt ||
tāñ ca vivastrakāṃ kṛtvā bhagaṃ cumbayen muhurmuhuḥ ||
tābhiś ca vṛṣyate bolaṃ gīyate nṛtyate paraṃ || (62)
abhiṣekaṃ dīyate tatra niśīthe vijane gṛhe || (64)
tat kṣaṇaṃ kīdṛśaṃ deva kathayasva mahāprabho || (67)
āi na anta na mahyu tahiṃ natra bhava natra nirvāṇa ||
ehu so paramamahāsuha nau para nau appāṇa || (68)
svasavyetarapāṇes tu vṛddhā vānāmikā ca yā ||
kim apy utpadyate tatra mūrkhasya <hi> svapnaṃ yathā |

div.p: hevajrābhyudayaḥ pañcamaḥ paṭalaḥ ||

lg.l: devīṃ vai gāḍham āliṅgya kṣiptvā bolaṃ kapālake |
śravaṇayoḥ kuṇḍalaṃ dhāryaṃ mantraṃ japtuṃ ca kaṇṭhikā |
rucakaṃ prāṇivandhaṃ tyaktuṃ mudrām bhajituṃ ca mekhalaṃ |
prahasanan tataḥ kṛtvā dantaiḥ saṃpīḍya cādharaṃ |
pṛcchate tatra sā devī hevajraṃ sahajarūpiṇaṃ || (5)
katareṇa vidhānena kayā kriyayā tathā prabho |
śavakeśasya kuccā ca likhanīyaṃ paṭaṃ guru || (7)
sūtraṃ ca yayā kāryaṃ kartavyañ ca paṭaṃ yayā |
ange niraṃśukaṃ bhūtvā nagnibhūyas tathā punaḥ |

div.p: hevajrapaṭavidhānapaṭalaḥ ṣaṣtaḥ ||

lg.l: oṣṭhaṃ dantena saṃpīḍya kathaṃ bhavati pustakaṃ ||
śṛṇu devi mahābhāge pustakaṃ kathayāmy ahaṃ |
pustakañ ca paṭañ caiva yadi vā dunduraḥ paśyati |
iha janmani na siddhiḥ syān na vā paralokagocare || (3)
athavā vijane prānte idaṃ bhojanam ārabhet || (7)
sthānaṃ jñātvā yathāpūrvaṃ diśāsu vidiśāsu ca || (9)
bhakṣañ ca bhakṣayet tatra rājaśāliṃ prayatnataḥ |
bhuktvā bhuktvā punas tatra pūjyante tatra mātaraḥ || (10)
yadi vā mātā bhaginī bhāgineyī ca śvasṛkā |
gurave dadyān mahābhāgī vandayitvā svayaṃ pibet || (12)
muhurmuhuḥ praṇāmañ ca kurvanti tatra sādhakāḥ || (13)

div.p: bhojanapaṭalaḥ saptamaḥ ||

lg.l: tatra pṛcchanti yoginyo mahāmudrā tu kīdṛśī ||
nātidīrghā nātihrasvā na kṛṣṇā na ca gaurikā ||
padmaṃ cendīvaraṃ gandhaṃ kṛṣṇāt padmam ivācaret || (3)
tāṃ ca prāpya bhavet siddhiḥ sahajānandarūpiṇī || (5)
athāha nairātmyāyoginī bhagavan praṇidhānaṃ kīdṛśaṃ kartavyaṃ ||
tatra tuṣṭā tu sā devī idaṃ vacanam abravīt ||
durdāntā dundurāḥ sattvā vineyaṃ yānti kena hi || (8)
poṣadhaṃ dīyate prathamaṃ tadanu śikṣāpadaṃ daśaṃ |
vaibhāṣyaṃ tatra deśeta sūtrāntaṃ vai punas tathā || (9)
yogācāraṃ tataḥ paścāt tadanu madhyamakaṃ diśet |
gṛhnīyāt sādaraṃ śiṣyaḥ sidhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ || (10)

div.p: vineyapaṭalo nāmāṣṭaḥ ||

lg.l: māraṇaṃ kriyate kṛpayā śrāvayitvā gurau munau ||
yatra dṛṣṭvā yathārūpam adhomukhaṃ tu bhāvayet ||
tasya mārge sūcīṃ dhyāyāt praviśantīṃ vahnirūpiṇīṃ ||
asmin tantre na hotavyaṃ mudrābandhakriyā na ca ||
rahasyaṃ paramaṃ vakṣye śṛṇu devī varānane ||
ayogyaḥ syād aviddhena viddhaḥ san rucidāyakaḥ || (8)
aviśuddhaṃ viṣatāṃ yāti viśuddhaṃ pīyūṣavad bhavet || (9)
yena rūpeṇa saṃbhūtaṃ tad ahaṃ vacmi śṛṇvatāṃ || (10)
aṣṭāsyāṃ vimokṣā aṣṭau śūnyatā ṣoḍaśa bhujāḥ ||
māṃsena pukkasī khyātā śavarī raktena kalpitā ||
caṇḍālī śukram ity uktaṃ ḍombī ca medamajjayoḥ ||
yena mantreṇa jantūnāṃ karmāṇi yānti siddhitāṃ || (14)
śṛṇu devi mahābhāge mantraṃ te kathayāmy ahaṃ || (15)
ādau vairocanaṃ dattva uṣmāṇāñ ca caturthakaṃ ||

pukkasīśobhanaṃ divyaṃ śūnyākrāntaṃ śuklavarṇaṃ ||
svāhāntaṃ niyojayet ||
ādau varṇādhipaṃ dattva tadanu khecariṃ tataḥ ||
svāhāntaṃ yojitaṃ kṛtvā buddhān api vaśīkaret || (17)
śūnyaṃ svāhāntaṃ yojayed buddhānām apy uccāṭayet || (18)
svāhāntaṃ ca punaḥ kṛtvā mārayet suramānuṣān || (22)
hrīḥkāraṃ yojayet tatra svāhāntaṃ punar ācaret ||
uṣmānāñ ca caturthakaṃ pukkāsyāś ca vibhūṣitaṃ ||

div.p: dviguṇīkṛtya pañcamasya tṛtīyaṃ dvitīyasya tṛtīyaṃ vahnibhūṣitaṃ hūṃkāratrayayojitaṃ | pañcamasya dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyasya prathamaṃ svāhāntaṃ ṣaḍbhujasya mantraḥ | (31)
vairocanādicaturthasya prathamaṃ hutāśanasaṃyuktaṃ vetālīvibhūṣitaṃ | antasthānāṃ tṛtīyakaṃ ghasmarībhūṣitaṃ | prathamasya prathamam antasthānāṃ prathamena yuktaṃ vajrābhūṣitaṃ | (32)

kṣakāraṃ caurībhūṣitaṃ | pañcamasya prathamaṃ | uṣmāṇāṃ caturthakaṃ vajraḍākinībhūṣitaṃ | śūnyākrāntaṃ triguṇitaṃ phaṭ svāhāntaṃ
dvibhujasya | (33)

nairātmyā prathamasya prathamaṃ dvitīyasya prathamaṃ tṛtīyasya prathamaṃ caturthasya prathamaṃ pañcamasya prathamam antasthānāṃ prathamam uṣmāṇāṃ prathamaṃ vairocanādisvāhāntaṃ | purakṣobhanamantro lakṣajāpaḥ | (34)
antasthānāṃ dvitīyan tu kṣakāradvayaṃ | madhye punar antasthānāṃ dvitīyakaṃ | hūṃkāratrayaṃ vairocanādi phaṭkāravidarbhitaṃ svāhāntaṃ | bhūmiśodhanamantraḥ | (35)
vairocanādi tadanu vajrā hūṃkārāntaṃ khānapānādhiṣṭhānamantraḥ | (36)
vairocanādi tadanu akāro mukhaṃ | uṣmāṇān tritīyakaṃ | antasthānāñ caturthakam upari vahnibhūṣitaṃ || dharmāṇāṃ | tadanu vajrā cādyanutpannatvāt oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā sarvabhautikabalimantraḥ | (37)
mantroddhārapaṭalo navamaḥ ||

lg.l: sphaṭikena stambhanaṃ jāpyaṃ vaśye ca raktacandanaṃ ||
stambhane kṣīrapānaṃ tu vaśye svacchandam ācaret ||
māraṇe sihlakaṃ caiva ākṛṣṭau ca catuḥsamaṃ || (4)
athavā antaśvam ādiśvaṃ nādiṃ gādiṃ hādiṃ tathaiva ca || (5)

div.p: jāpapaṭalo nāma daśamaḥ ||

lg.l: bhage liṅgaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya ity āha cakranāyakaḥ ||
anāmikāmūle yasya striyo vā puruṣasya vā ||
yo hi yogī bhavet kṛṣṇo akṣobhyas tasya devatā ||
yo hi yogī mahāgauro vairocanaḥ kuladevatā || (5)
yo hi yogī mahāśyāmo amoghas tasya devatā ||
yo hi yogī mahāpiṅgo ratneśaḥ kuladevatā || (6)
raktagauro hi yo yogī amitābhaḥ kuladevatā ||
śvetagauro hi yo yogī tasya [vajra]sattvakulaṃ bhavet || (7)
tathāgatānāṃ kulās te syū rūpam āśritya sāṃvṛtaṃ || (8)
strīṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ caiva yathā puṃsi tathaiva ca ||
tāsām api kulās te syuḥ saṃvṛtyācārarūpataḥ || (9)
nairātmyāṃ bodhayām āsa śṛṇu devi prapūjanaṃ || (10)
muhurmuhuḥ kāmayed vajrī adha ūrdhvaṃ nirīkṣayet ||
karpūraṃ pīyate tatra madanaṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ ||

div.p: sahajārthapaṭalo nāmaikadeśaḥ ||

lg.l: yathā buddhair atītais tu sicyate bodhiputrakāḥ ||
gṛhṇa gṛhṇa mahāsattva gṛhītvā pūjanaṃ kuru || (3)
virajaṃ mokṣadaṃ śāntaṃ pitā te tvam asi svayaṃ || (4)
caturānandasvabhāga viśva hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ kāryaṃ kuruṣva me || (5)
khaga mukhaikaraso nātha hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ kāryaṃ kuruṣva me ||
śirasi oṃkāraṃ hṛdi hūṃkāraṃ kiñjalke ākāraṃ || (6)

div.p: mahātantrarājamāyākalpo dvitīyaḥ ||
